data.title: Winter Roads
data.meta_description: Information about the Fort Chipewyan Winter Road, La Loche Winter Trail, and how to get updates on winter road conditions.
data.text:
How long are the winter roads?

The Fort Chipewyan Winter Road is 177 km from gate to gate.

The La Loche Winter Trail is 62 km from Hwy 881 to the Saskatchewan border.

Are there mile markers on the Fort Chipewyan winter road? Yes. There are mile markers starting in Fort Chipewyan that run south to the entrance gate by the washrooms. Markers can be used for emergency situations and wide loads. Do drivers need to radio in the markers to anyone? No. There is no requirement to call in to anyone while travelling the road. How can I get information on the Fort Smith Winter Road?
